thread.title: Bill Kirk
thread.title_full: SelectQuote Auto & Home reviewed by Bill Kirk

author: Bill Kirk
title: Bill Kirk
text: William was so helpful - I have a very full schedule and have little time to deal with hassling over minor details. Switching insurance was an absolute necessity for me but William made it easy by calling me back not just once - but several times as needed in order for us to accomplish getting all the information needed to make the switch.
